auditorium

Class MessageSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • auditorium.MessageSocket

  • public class MessageSocket
extends java.lang.Object
    This class wraps a socket that interfaces with the outside world in the form of Message instances. This type of socket can only send and receive entire auditorium messages.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ASEInputStreamReader _in 
      private ASEWriter _out 
      private java.net.Socket _socket

      MessageSocket(HostPointer host, int timeout)
      Construct a new message socket and connect it to the given host, but timeout the connection after a given period of time.
      MessageSocket(java.net.Socket socket)
      Construct a new message socket with an already connected socket.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageSocket

        public MessageSocket(HostPointer host,
             int timeout)
              throws NetworkException
        Construct a new message socket and connect it to the given host, but timeout the connection after a given period of time.
        Parameters:
        host - Connect to this host.
        timeout - Only wait this long for the connection to succeed.
        Throws:
        NetworkException - This method throws if there is a problem connecting.

      • MessageSocket

        public MessageSocket(java.net.Socket socket)
              throws NetworkException
        Construct a new message socket with an already connected socket.
        Parameters:
        socket - wrap this socket.
        Throws:
        NetworkException - This method throws if the socket given isn't already connected.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public void send(Message msg)
          throws NetworkException
        Send a message.
        Parameters:
        msg - Send this message.
        Throws:
        NetworkException - This method throws if the message can't be sent.

      • receive

        public Message receive()
                throws NetworkException,
                       IncorrectFormatException
        Receive a message.
        Returns:
        This method returns the message that is received.
        Throws:
        IncorrectFormatException - This method throws if the incoming s-exp isn't formatted as a message.
        InvalidVerbatimStreamException - This method throws if the incoming stream isn't s-expressions.
        NetworkException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Close the socket.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - This method throws if the decorated call to close throws.
